name: Speedy 2
description:
Speedy is back!

Speedy 2 is a minimalistic 2D platformer game. 

New obstacles are here!

Now, you have to avoid spikes, lasers and deadly waves!

Moreover, Speedy has the ability to dash, change size and destroy the law of gravity to reach his destination!

Controls: Left: A, Right: D, Jump: Space, Dash: Shift, Resize: Q, Pause: Esc ---The music was provided by PLUG N PLAY MUSIC--- Tobu & Marcus Mouya - Running Away [NCS Release] Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LSqttgJRud8&ab_channel=PLUGNPLAYMUSIC
